DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to ascertain whether Arotinolol Hydrochloride reduces mortality and cardiovascular events in chronic kidney disease stage 5 patients with hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Arotinolol Hydrochloride on Cardiovascular Events in Hypertensive Haemodialysis Patients
